observed: I saw an upright animal standing on the road on the north side of the Salmon River.  It was after dark and I caught him in my headlights.  He stood for about 10 seconds. in my headlights and then jumped off the bank down into the river bottom. The animal was about 7 feet  tall, remained upright, was brown in color, and his eyes showed green in the headlights. When he jumped off the road, the creature was very agile and jumped easily.
location_details: On the North Fork Road Along the Salmon River approx. 2 miles west of Panther Creek on the Salmon National Forest northwest of Salmon, Idaho.
